meanings.definition: A cluster of urediniospores produced by a rust fungus.
meanings.sent1: The uredinia on the leaf showed the presence of the rust fungus.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the uredinia spreading on the plant.
meanings.sent3: The uredinia seemed to be having a party on the leaf!
meanings.sent4: The uredinia clustered together like a tiny village of spores.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange color of the uredinia made them stand out on the green leaf.

meanings.definition: The stage in the life cycle of a rust fungus where urediniospores are produced.
meanings.sent1: During the uredinia phase, the rust fungus releases spores for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the uredinia stage to understand the rust fungus better.
meanings.sent3: The uredinia stage was like a busy factory inside the fungus!
meanings.sent4: In nature, the uredinia phase is a crucial time for the rust fungus.
meanings.sent5: The uredinia stage marks a significant point in the life cycle of the rust fungus.
